eventDetails.name: Cardiff
eventDetails.tagline: One Day. One Track. One Community

speakers.text: We are excited to bring a number of incredible speakers to Cardiff to share their stories on a range of topics. We will shortly open a call for papers, where we are looking for real life stories of how organisations have adopted serverless, the benefits they have seen, what worked and what didnâ€™t work well and what they expect looking to the future. We hope to announce speakers following the call for papers covering a variety of areas on different cloud providers.

agenda.name: Networking and Drinks - the venue will stay open till 22:00

venue.text:
After the success of the 2020 edition, ServerlessDays Cardiff will once again be held in the DEPOT 
 
**Location:** DEPOT, Williams Way, Penarth Road, Cardiff, CF10 5DY
